attributes.action: tougher laws on animal and child abuse
attributes.additional_details: This is a must Important issue when adults abuse or hurt animals or kids Something is wrong Its breaks my heart to see it over and over u do things so wrong ect the crazy childprotection and dangerous dog act. We have to start from the beginning all must be educated in schools from the start. Teach love and respect all animals then the child on bullies in school this will have a better outcome lets face it its got to change

rejection.details: This petition involves the policies of two different government departments
